name: Explosive gun
description:
You have to save your caged friends and kill the armed enemies. 4 levels where each level your gun is more out of control. You can shoot every few seconds, but your gun will shoot on it's own randomly as well.  It has lots of recoil, so use it to help yourself jump great distances.

Controls:

A-left

D-right

W or Spacebar - jump

Left click - shoot

Mouse - aim

PS. This is my first game jam and I ran out of time to finish it, I hope that you enjoy what I could upload.
